@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package net.consensys.cava.concurrent

Classes and utilities for working with concurrency.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncCompletion
    A completion that will be complete at a future time.
    AsyncResult<T>
    A result that will be available at a future time.
    CompletableAsyncCompletion
    An AsyncCompletion that can later be completed successfully or with a provided exception.
    CompletableAsyncResult<T>
    An AsyncResult that can be later completed successfully with a provided value, or completed with an exception.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicSlotMap<K extends java.lang.Comparable,V>
    An atomic map that locates available keys within a DiscreteDomain.
    ExpiringMap<K,V>
    A concurrent hash map that stores values along with an expiry.

Package net.consensys.cava.concurrent Description

Classes and utilities for working with concurrency.

These classes are included in the standard Cava distribution, or separately when using the gradle dependency 'net.consensys.cava:cava-concurrent' (cava-concurrent.jar).
